mapper.sql: so.id, so.order_no, so.customer_id, so.seller_id, so.sales_date, so.total_amount, so.status, so.remark, so.create_time, so.update_time
mapper.select: select , c.customer_name, u.username as seller_name from sales_order so left join customer c on so.customer_id = c.id left join sys_user u on so.seller_id = u.id where so.id = #{id}

select soi.id as item_id, soi.sales_order_id, soi.product_id, soi.quantity, soi.sale_price, soi.amount, p.product_code, p.product_name, p.spec, p.unit from sales_order_item soi left join product p on soi.product_id = p.id where soi.sales_order_id = #{salesOrderId}
mapper.insert:
insert into sales_order_item ( sales_order_id, product_id, quantity, sale_price, amount ) values
